pkgmetadata.longdescription: Sparse Gaussian Markov Random Field Mixtures for Anomaly Detection // An implementation of sparse Gaussian Markov random field mixtures presented by Ide et al. (2016) doi:10.1109/ICDM.2016.0119. It provides a novel anomaly detection method for multivariate noisy sensor data. It can automatically handle multiple operational modes. And it can also compute variable-wise anomaly scores.
